Key Arguments: The legislation will restrict free speech.
History shows that such restrictions can be used by those in power for their own benefit.
Politicians and bureaucrats should not control free speech.
Notable Quotes: "If liberty means anything at all, it means the right to tell people what they do not want to hear." - George Orwell
History proves that attempts to restrict speech leads to those in power using legislation of this type for their own benefit which is sinister.
